name: Joshua King
text: Hardly any parking(for trucks) without being in the way. The guard literally said “wherever you can park” very unhelpful. I do not recommend delivering to this facility.

name: truck driver
text: Tiny place with no parking. Wait times are extremely long even for a chicken plant so pack a lunch and dinner and be ready for a nap.

name: Jaime Self
text: There’s no reason for any drivers to have to wait here for so many hours.... very disorganized business.

name: Austin Hartwell (Countryboy82)
text: Not a safe place to work

name: Bimmer Fan
text: Never deliver in here. You will wait for unloading forever

name: Philip Wanja
text: Get ready for the long wait got here at 6AM and left there 10pm 😡

name: richie perryman
text:
Loooong wait time. Make driver appointments and then unload drop trailers first. Bad place
Most of the workers can't speak English

name: Juana Garcia
text:
(Translated by Google) well

bien

name: Aaron
text: If you truck driver, only one thing you can get here! Just wait wait wait load/unload long long time ! Good luck to waste your time

name: ted cook
text: No Pets at all on the property or even in your truck which is bullshit.

name: Chris Hemperley
text: Took 5 hrs to load 2 trucks no pets allowed even in your truck they told me to change my set point  to where it wont match the bills. Lazy and slow

name: Denis Trofi
text:
Koch foods has moved 1 mile away to 3500 West Blvd
Montgomery, AL  36108
United States

name: Elizabeth Wiley
text: Amazing great attitude!! They came in before my appointment  (7am) and got me empty real quick. This is what I'm talking about!!! Thanks again don't have a problem coming back!!! Not only did I get empty fast. I'm having a trl tire issue and them letting sit here while I wait for someone to come is great!!

name: Chris Warren
text: I was very pleased with my experience at this facility. Everyone was very courteous and the gentlemen in the warehouse even loaded my products for me. If I could give 10 stars,I would.

name: H H
text: Thank you one more timeThis companies is awesome company people ar  extra nice If you have a schedule appointment for pick up you can pick up earlier if the product is ready

name: Carlos Rivera
text: Awesome place, I coming early and this people load my container real fast. Thanks

name: INNOVATIVE 84
text:
Very fast unloading (40 min) despite we were 1 hr late.
Thank you.

name: carroll sanders
text: There are best snacks you can buu

name: Andrew
text: This place is fantastic to pick up bulk peanuts. Never taken longer than an hour and a half to get loaded. You scale in and out.  They load heavy so be mindful of your fuel. Fcfs until 14:30. Need a 450 number and your trailer license plate and state. Looking forward to getting dispatched to pick up here again.

name: Phyllis Moyer
text: Easiest dock I have had the pleasure of backing into in a long time. Friendly staff and pretty quick to load. Helpful, too....

name: Yelena Ognevchuk
text: Great people . Very little signs . Must have load bars .

name: K Owens
text: Pick up load w 53' dry van. FCFS 07:00-14:30. Has scale on site & people are friendly.

name: dogsforu&me 10
text: The personal is so friendly

name: Claybone
text:
Slow getting hoppers empty

can take as much as 4hrs plus

name: Sophia Brown
text: Great job

name: Candy Johnson
text: Great

name: Abdiaziz Dek
text: Quick in and out and easy backing...👍

name: Richard Slowik
text: I might have a bias but I love it!

name: Cris Nicco
text: Fast loading...

name: Abdishakur Mohamud
text: Very slow loading

name: Jason Hayes
text: I’ve shopped at several places from Panama City, Dothan, even Tallahassee Florida, the knowledge of products and the range of products at max one in Dothan is hands down the best. Rick is extremely knowledgeable about nutrition and supplementation, he has shared that with his staff to make this the best place for anyone who cares about their health and well being, not just building muscle and losing weight but all around health. I highly recommend this place!!!!👍🏻

name: Kevin Ellison
text: They are very knowledgeable, not only about their products, but other products as well. They made selecting a product very easy and stress free for a novice such as myself. I will definitely be doing more buisness here.

resp.text: Thank you Kevin! We appreciate your support

name: Nathalia Alexandra
text: 100% recomend, best nutritional advice ive ever had with immediate results

name: Steven Enfinger
text: The supplements that I bought here helped me get faster results than I thought was possible.

resp.text: We appreciate your support!! We look forward to being there for all your Supplement and Nutritional goals...

name: Mela Davis
text: It a nice clean , health store. they have amazing customer service. By the time  walked out the store , I was encouraged to start.

name: kokobitty
text: The service at Max One is AMAZING, and nothing short of the word! Rick is so friendly knowledgeable and patient! He could answer every question I had about every single product I asked about. He only recommended the best product for my needs, even when it was cheaper. He never got short or annoyed. I greatly appreciated his informing me so kindly because my knowledge was VERY limited. The shop was flawless, welcoming comfortable and very well stocked with an EXTREMELY wide array of products to choose from. Organic seasoning blends and toning creams and lots in between. I am definitely won over and will be using them for a lot of my fitness needs! Thank you Rick! God bless and see you soon!

resp.text: Thank you very much and appreciate your support!!!

name: Nail Diva
text: Rick  has great customer Service and personalizes his customer visits. He knows about his products and won’t steer you wrong.

name: Caleb Efurd
text: I’ve been shopping here since 2012. I refuse to go anywhere else. I now live in Tampa, Fl, but I make the drive to shop here. The BEST nutrition store. Period.

resp.text: We appreciate you Caleb!! It’s always good to see you and your wife when you guys visit us.

name: Joe Ferguson
text: Awesome selection and customer service!

name: Ashley Smith
text: Amazing customer service and great prices ! Wont go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you Ashley!! We appreciate you very much, Let us know if we can do anything to assist with your fitness goals...

name: Hunter Nolen
text: My wife and I love this store!

resp.text: Thank you Hunter! For allowing us to be there for you and your family!!

name: Katherine Meyer (Kat)
text:
Walked in for the first time today. I came in with my husband, he and the associate talked about products for a while and my husband's time in the Marines came up. I let them talk for a while and browsed around, figuring my husband was getting the help he needed.

When they broke so that we could browse, the associate asked if I was also in the military and I said no. To this he said "Oh, so you let him do all the hard work?" What am I supposed to take from this? Does he think I have it so easy? This was just such a rude and presumptuous thing to say. I was so ticked I wanted to leave right away.

UPDATED:
The owner has been very understanding about the event and I'm glad he reached out to me to try to make things right. I really do appreciate his efforts and I've updated my rating to reflect this.

name: Chris Cruse
text: The guys here are not only professional but very well educated on their inventory and helpful in reaching your fitness needs. My wife and I highly recommend this establishment.

name: Samuel Coleridge
text: Fantastic staff who are all very knowledgeable!

resp.text: Thank you Sam! Much appreciated for the review....

name: Nowoghomwenma Ibie
text: Great selection and the owner is very well versed on various workout products.

name: I love Coffee
text: Knowledgeable no BS employees and decent prices.

name: Mike McArdle
text: Products are fresh and work exactly as indicated! Have a question and need a solution, Rick is the man! He knows his business inside out. :-)

name: Slammed305
text: Rick has always given me the best advice and treats me like a brother whenever I'm in there. Some people might shy away from the store due to slightly higher prices, but the quality of the products Rick has are a cut above that generic GNC, Walmart, etc BS that everyone else buys. If you wanna make gains, cut the fat, or just become a better, more physically fit you, then I suggest you go hollar at Rick.

name: Travis Porter
text: Great supplement store! The store is clean, the staff is very knowledgable and they carry a wide selection of product to include SHREDZ supplements.

name: DOUXSKIGAMA HANMA (TSD)
text: No bs'n here. You tell them what you are trying to do with your workout and they will get you what you need.

name: stephen powell
text: Outstanding customer service, products and product knowledge

name: Jayden Huffman
text: Family day is awesome, and I don’t know much about LR’s but the MR+ team is very nice and I love the work, my mom has worked here for almost 12 years now and it is a good place

name: JC Jackson
text: Even though they let u do ur 10hr here their parking area is very small.  I was in a line of rigs waiting to get either loaded or unloaded.  Not to mention the lights in the docking area didn't really help at all.🤷🏿‍♂️

name: Christopher Robin
text: Arrived on 07/27/21 21:38 for an 07/28/21 01:00 appointment . Got put in a door around 23:00 and had bills in hand around midnight . Gravel staging area is small but they did let me finish my 10 hr break but I wouldn’t depend on parking here overnight because it does get crowded

name: Matthew Marshall
text: Excellent job 2000 dollar sign on bonus and great benifits

name: Jorge Hernandez
text:
Been here 12 hrs and still waiting to get finished loading
Like one of the other comment's Ill definitely rember still place so I don't come back..

name: rodolfo delarosa
text:
Arrived 7:30 am to get loaded. Didn't roll till 9:30 PM. Unbelievable.... 😒
#RunningLate

name: Michael Spaulding
text: Takes forever to get loaded or unloaded. I will try my best to remember this place and avoid any loads picking up or delivering here!!!

name: Hoyt Middleton
text: Staff is helpful and supportive and willing to help their team members and associates

name: Brent S.
text:
Early arrival parking ok. Once loaded or empty should leave. Small staging area.
People nice. Pretty fast loading. About 1.5 hours or less.

name: Laketta Jackson
text: It's an alright place to work great that it pays weekly but it is rather cold inside

name: Charmaine Townes
text: If I could give this place zero stars I definitely would. They have their picks of who they like. To work there was not a very good experience at all. Now if you just need a quick job to get on your feet then do it but do not stay. This was the worst company I've ever worked for. They say it's like family it really is not. Their point system is a joke. The pay is even worse. I'm so glad I do not work there anymore. They need all new management. In my opinion they just do not care about their employees. That's why they have such a high turn over rate. But I'm glad I'm gone I have a way better job that pays double. And my company is awesome they could learn a thing or two from my new company.

name: Valery L
text: Not bad, 18 hrs to get loaded, nothing to add

name: francisco camacho
text: we had a 1 pm pick up apt, waited over 12 hours to get loaded, don't go here all they do is lie to you

name: James Rolls
text: I don't know anything about working here, BUT picking up a load has been a pleasure. This is my 2nd load out of here in the past week,  and my experience has been VERY POSITIVE. I have dealt with 2 different shifts, and both have been efficient, helpful and friendly from the gate, shipping clerks and loaders.

name: Robert Mobley
text: Very slow getting loaded. But they were very friendly.

name: Rich Tygart
text: Trucker: The workers were very friendly and helpful but I sat for 17 hours before they loaded me then ran out my 14 hour clock and couldn't drive because they took the entire day to load me. I had to sleep another night there. Backing into the dock was impossible because of the precarious position of randomly placed trailers. I had to unhook and have one of the lot jockeys get my trailer back into the dock.

name: TD “Yourdaddyboi” Roberson
text: Alatrade is not a bad chicken plant to get loaded at. I've been to worse places. They usually get me loaded in a decent amount of time. Some of the staff do act immature like they in high school and the light skin guard guy acts like he either hates his job or he just not customer friendly. The older lady and older man guards are nicer and customer friendly. I know we all got to work but they need to tighten up and appreciate having jobs. Show respect to all customers and drivers there. Tonight I got here a little after 7 checked in and was put on a door immediately. It's now 2 AM and still they are not done loading??? I mean how long does it take to load 11k lbs of chicken? Won't make 7 am delivery now. Appreciate you Alatrade... SMH

name: Pedro Martell
text: Has overnight parking. Tight. Not bad speed to load.

name: Marlon Smith
text: Loaded and heading to Morton MS

name: Mule MOB
text: They don’t want to paid you, no 41k no sick days no nothing, under paying

name: ej queen
text: I've worked here for 6 years and absolutely love my job 😊😊

name: Ramon Royal
text: For starting out to pay is something that you can't complain about got great benefits and other offers one thing I could use each station that requires standing for long periods of time should be allowed to have stools for workers to sit and do their job but other than that I just started maybe I have to be there for a little longer to see what more it has to offer

name: Joe Nino
text: I got to this place at 12:50 p.m. and they took them about 5 hours to get me unloaded and about another 4 hours to get me reloaded. This will probably be the last time I come here. The only reason I took this load was because they were paying pretty good but it all adds up at the end with all the time wasted and everything, that's the reason why they pay what they pay but I don't think its worth it... 😕🙁

name: Surinder Singh
text: Check in now at 11:15 AM. security guard and shipping office people really nice treat to mi. I give 5 stars now I wating for load what time they loading mi , continue for next comment

name: MyO MyO
text: This chicken coop of a plant reeks the ghetto and rachete. I felt like i walking in some bad raggety azz projects/slums. The plant has no standards or diversity as for the people they hire nor uniform wise as well. I went for interview and turned right back around. I'd rather work fast food than this chicken plant. Good luck to anyone who feel like they got them a job. LOL

name: Murat Sevimcok
text: Pack you lunch or dinner. You ll be here for a while

name: Phoenix XIII-2
text: If i could give it a 0 star i would

name: Latrise Williams
text: It really isn't a safe place to work, I almost got attacked.... Twice!!! After the first incident I was told I wouldn't have to work with the girl anymore n after her suspension which she should've gotten fired she tried attacking me again. They suspended me n I told them they promised I wouldn't have to work with her they ignored that fact!!! This place is a joke n I'm talking to a lawyer!!

name: Melanie Norris
text: I was violently attacked  on Alatrade property and the administrative staff ignored this fact and treated it as if it was an altercation between two people. I will not be able to go back to work in an unsafe environment. Someone can be tragically hurt due to upper management not knowing how to handle violent situations.

name: Reeko Young
text: Great place to work,the guards are exceptionally friendly, great chances to move up

name: Hyped Diablo
text: This place was good at first till I got a cyst on my wrist I went to doc like they said she sent me home saying bring back a doctors excuse or they can’t work me when it was work related accident they couldn’t pay to drain a cyst makes no sense

name: Darrell Mister
text: When my wife was violently attacked on Alatrade properties, because administration did not follow proper procedures and have the attacker arrested; The attacker went outside and pulled out a knife and waited for my wife to come outside to stab her. Seeking a Lawyer!

name: Liz H
text: Always hiring. 2 shifts available Monday thru Friday, some Saturdays

name: Ms. Karisha Upshaw
text: Pay is too low but they offer a great portability package on insurance.

name: Khalifa O
text: One of the worst places I’ve been. I got here 4 hours ago and got a door 2 hours later. Docked last 2 hours and they haven’t started yet. This will be my last time. Slow af.

name: Luis
text: Drivers be aware! They never stick to an appt time and if you run elogs you're screwed.

name: Norbert Mark Dadzie
text: Excellent.

name: XxLj_Hoopin23xX
text: terrible business the coworkers are immature like its highschool the pay is terrible for the work u have to do..can't believe Alabama gets away with their minimum wage..98% of staff has attitudes smh..not to mention the fights an nasty things found out there..dnt apply

name: Robert Lollis
text: This place sucks I only give one star becouse I cant give zero stars been here since 2 pm and still not loaded and it 8 pm now wtf!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Devanar Simmons
text: Man this place is just like a high school...sometimes a club in the hood. I wouldn't dare refer anyone to work here its terrible.

name: Doyle Schrader
text: 2200 appt checked in at 22:05 said it was gonna be around midnight. They would come for me when they're ready.  O600 checked back in, told it would be another 3 hours. O930 checked back, shipping went home.  I wont be back!

name: Gokillyourself Bish
text: The lady that always answer the phone here in the daytime doesn't need to be there. She beat and hurt my little sister.

name: Charanji Lal
text: I checked in at noon march 3 and it march 4th and counting still haven't loaded yet

name: G master
text: 17 h to get loaded !! they ar slow slow

name: Neal Smith
text: Okay, limited parking, park in the back in the gravel, report to shipper, someone will come to you to give you dock number, near the appointment time, extremely busy, heavy load, chicken, cat scale at chevron 4 miles up 431 north, usually they load all up front.

name: Shelton Wheeler

name: Dwayne Buggs
text: The Louisville Pecan Company pecan halves and pieces are the best quality that one can buy. I have enjoyed them for over seven years.

name: Creek's Lawn Care
text: This Christmas, I received two bags of Chocolate and two bags of White Chocolate covered pecans. I absolutely love them. I'm finishing off the last bag of White Chocolate tonight. Thank you for your commitment to making a quality product.

name: InterstateBullly Enygunna
text: They work with you to get loaded with a decent weight.

name: Pamela Queen
text: Best pecans I have ever bought! My family always requests my homemade pecan pie for Thanksgiving!

name: Susan Raster
text:
We have been buying these pecans for years.  They are great for baking, but we love them plain just to snack on. They are always requested by our friends and family.
Thank you for making them available.

name: Claudia Washington
text: I live in Michigan best pecan ever.

name: Judy Ivey
text:
As a one time business owner, Louisville Pecan Co. always shipped my order quickly with the freshest pecans and exactly the amounts I had ordered.  Our business grew which required us to order more often and, as before, we were shipped the best tasting pecans and our orders were always correct and shipped in a timely fashion.  Thank you!

Judy Ivey
A Tasters Choice Catering, LLC
Shreveport, LA

name: Victor Griffin
text: This place has the best pecans in the area!!! You can get bits and pieces, halves, chocolate covered, candied, and many other types. They come in small package to large cases. They also can't be bought in gift boxes or even decorative tins. The prices are great and don't forget to ask about free shipping!!!!! Thank you Louisville Pecan for having such a great product!!!!!! Hurry and order them now!!!!!!

name: Terry Moore
text: Supreme oil is now closed .

name: John Carder
text: Place is closing down.

name: Suanne Nutter
text: Hustle Bustle

name: Ve You
text: Fast unloaded time and have a couple spots for over night parking 👍🏾👍🏾

name: Otha Huckaby
text: great delivery.smells good with all the spices that they have.

name: Kewuan Maxwell
text: Overnight parking nice and quiet. Loves is a mile away but it fills fast.

name: James
text: Good people. Got me in an hour before my appointment and I was able to park the night before.

name: Christopher D. “Slimmsta” Leonard
text: Quicc of unloading FREIGHT

text: Great service

text: Load me quick

text: Fast unloading !!!

text: Slow Slow Slow

name: Ralph Harris
text: Quick

name: Kevin Gilbert
text: In and Out

name: Joshua Whitson
text: People here were borderline over friendly.  Extremely fast to unload.  Only downside is it is tight to back a truck up to the dock.  Have no issues delivering here again.

name: Edward Napper
text: Hard to back in very tight..overnight parking on street in front of spectrum cable building

name: Paul Calhoun
text: People were very professional, knew their product well. And truly made me feel like I was their only customer

name: Jason Amburgey
text: Very nice people. Within 5 minutes 2 separate forklift drivers asked if I had been helped and offered me a free cold drink. They take lunch between 11am to 1145am. Front office lady where I thanked them for restrooms and cold drink was also very nice.

name: Midnight Rider
text: I can’t speak to the other good reviews but they are currently remodeling the inside and are unorganized and slow af. The lot is not for semis so do not pull in with out scoping it out on foot to see if you can turn around. Otherwise you will be blindsiding in a lot for b class trucks. Appts mean nothing here. Got here at 7a and it’s now 936 making me late for my next appt. they did however allow people with a 1pm appt time deliver 6 hours early. Take it slow and goal.

resp.text: We apologize for your less than satisfactory experience with us. Our warehouse remodel has just begun and we are currently adjusting to meet our customers’ and drivers’ needs accordingly. As seen in our records, we had one 7 o’clock appointment who showed up on time and was unloaded by 7:20. In order to service you best in the future, we would love to know when your appointment was scheduled for and where you were picking up from? Please feel free to share for any feedback that will allow us to better serve you. If you would like to discuss your experience further, please contact our Customer Service at: (205) 595-8381.

name: Darrin Brown
text: Old school class act 360°. Empathy baby pass it forward.

name: Eric Kline
text: Nice place, quick unload, parking, you don't have to back in off the street if you know how to drive. Come here often

name: Jose Meza
text: Good delivery

name: j. rod
text: people here were fast nice very attentive and free drinks for visitors.

name: Delajla Muhamedbegovic
text: Fast unloading

name: Rick Mosteller
text: Parking lot is tight for semi's

name: Jj Jeter
text: Great company

name: S Thomas
text:
The airport authority really needs to kick this monopoly out. This company doesn't give tho craps about the customers at all. With a few name brand restaurants in the terminal, none of them live up to the brand standards.  Jim n nicks is a disappointment,  chick fil a is no pleasure, grounded is an absolute disaster, and starbucks should be renamed to StarYucks..
The stores are always out of something, the taste is way off,  and service, there is no service. These people act like they don't care and it really shows that they do not care at all.

name: Larhonda Riley
text: Son once worked there and it was not a great experience. Employees are what make the company but the management and supervisors should be replaced

name: Ray Wood
text:
I have shopped here for many years .
Always pleasant as i placed my orders.

I regret that they are closing down after Christmas. I will miss them.

name: Tim Gee
text: Great friendly service.  They treat you like family.

name: Beverly Williamson
text: Luv the pies👍

name: Tim Gee
text: Awesome Will Call Service.. Great customer service reps

name: C
text: This place is a joke don’t come here!! And oh yeah don’t worry about being on time because they don’t care.

name: Jerry James
text: Great place to unload real quick nice people

name: Oscar Flores
text: Overnight parking available!  Walmart 1 mile away. Unloaded in and out

name: William Barbour
text: Great place to deliver to. They were quick to get me unloaded and on my way! Everyone there were professional and friendly!

name: Abdi Mohamed
text: Great place the guy at receiver is great fast unloading

name: Mel Benter
text: I can't honestly say how their service is once you are a customer, but they are constantly coming into our office trying to make contact with our kitchen staff to solicit, even though we have a "No Soliciting" sign on our door.  I have explained numerous times that I have clients I'm meeting with and cannot be constantly interrupted by a food sales team that does not bother to make appointments.  They have contact information for our kitchen staff but I feel like they are trying to "catch us off guard" and hope to catch our Chef in the office so that he can't escape their vulture-like tactics.

name: MattJ 0078
text: Great food and customer service

name: Weston Whitt
text: To: Mrs. Halsey, Whitts Barbecue of Ardmore & Fayetteville,TN. along with our cooking facility in AL. left your business because of Mike and Terry! They didn't care or take the time to help us or give us the representative we wanted! Mike and Terry think their above your customers !

Horrible lumper fees

resp.text: Thank you for your great review, Chan! We appreciate your business & support.

resp.text: Lillian, thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your business very much.
